title: Riot really coming in clutch
body:
From this thread:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/GN0cboPj-new-house-mission-finishers-trigger-epilepsy

https://i.imgur.com/7vh9yZQ.png[/img]

You can hate on Riot for whatever reason, but them responding to this almost immediately and taking care of it is really cool.  You can't say that Riot never listens to the community because they definitely do.  As someone who also has epilepsy, this makes me really happy.  You gotta give them a lot of credit for this.

Wow
